alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 02 at 2:07PM PST until February 02 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING FOR LAKE TAHOE... * WHAT...East winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. Waves 2 to 4 feet. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong wind gusts up to 100 mph are occurring in the higher elevations of the Sierra. These winds may damage trees and lead to hazardous conditions for outdoor recreation along with dangerous wind chills.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
